network_address
uvm_object
network_address

The class is the placeholder of network address, like MAC addresss, IPV4 address IPV6 address.  Also provide some APIs to config IP address.

Functions
new
function new(
string name = "network_address"
)

Construction

get_ipv6_address
virtual function bit [127:0] get_ipv6_address()

Return the ipv6 address in 128bits format

get_ipv4_address
virtual function bit [31:0] get_ipv4_address()

Return the ipv4 address in 32bits format

set_ipv6_address
virtual function void set_ipv6_address(
bit [15:0] part7,
bit [15:0] part6,
bit [15:0] part5,
bit [15:0] part4,
bit [15:0] part3,
bit [15:0] part2,
bit [15:0] part1,
bit [15:0] part0
)

Set IPV6 address in 8 parts, below is the example:

address.set_ipv6_address('h2001, 'hcda, 'h0000, 'h0000, 'h0000, 'h0000, 'h3257, 'h9652);
set_ipv4_address
virtual function void set_ipv4_address(
bit [7:0] part3,
bit [7:0] part2,
bit [7:0] part1,
bit [7:0] part0
)

Set IPV6 address in 4 parts, below is the example:

address.set_ipv4_address(192, 168, 1, 1);
set_subnet_mask
virtual function void set_subnet_mask(
bit [7:0] part3,
bit [7:0] part2,
bit [7:0] part1,
bit [7:0] part0
)

Set IPV4 network subnet mask

address.set_subnet_mask(255, 255, 255, 0);
